lead_paragraph: The Libertarian Party presidential nominee said Hillary Clinton, as the former secretary of state, bore at least partial responsibility for the civilian deaths.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and ALEXANDER BURNS

headline.print_headline: Libertarian Nominee Equates U.S. and Syria
headline.main: Gary Johnson Equates Syria Deaths Caused by Assad and West

snippet: The Libertarian Party presidential nominee said Hillary Clinton, as the former secretary of state, bore at least partial responsibility for the civilian deaths....
abstract: Libertarian Party presidential nominee Gary Johnson says governments of both Syria and United States are equally responsible for high rate of civilian casualties in Syrian war; in same interview with The New York Times, Johnson attacks former Sec of State Hillary Clinton for overly interventionist instincts, saying she is being judged on broad base of foreign policy knowledge but not on outcomes of decisions made during her tenure.
